abstract: In a humbling move, Intel has pushed back, way back, the release of a graphics chip meant to challenge Nvidia and Advanced Micro Devices.
snippet: In a humbling move, Intel has pushed back, way back, the release of a graphics chip meant to challenge Nvidia and Advanced Micro Devices.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Nvidia and Advanced Micro Devices jumped higher on Monday after the companies’ mighty foe Intel revealed a lengthy product delay.

headline.main: Shares Rise in Graphics Firms After Intel Delays Chip
